item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Monday, December 15
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: FBI Confirms 630 Million Stolen Passwords — How To Check Yours Now
item.description: The FBI has confirmed that 630 million stolen passwords were found on devices belonging to a single hacker. Here's how to check if yours is one of the...

item.title: 8 Google Zero-Days Confirmed — Should You Stop Using Chrome?
item.description: Google has now confirmed no fewer than eight zero-day vulnerabilities affecting the Chrome browser this year. Is it time to change your browser?

item.title: iOS 26.2 Or iOS 18.7.3—Here’s Which New iPhone Update To Choose
item.description: Apple has released iOS 26.2 and iOS 18.7.3, fixing iPhone security holes that have been used to perform real-life attacks. So, which iPhone update sho...

item.title: 41 Microsoft Zero-Days — Now Millions Of Users Face Update Choice
item.description: Microsoft users must decide whether Patch Tuesday updates are enough after the Seattle tech behemoth confirmed 41 zero-day vulnerabilities.
